events.summary: CIA-backed mujahideen forced Soviet withdrawal, toppling the USSR-supported PDPA regime.
Post-9/11 invasion removed the Taliban but could not sustain a pro-U.S. government; Taliban regained power in 2021.
CIA/MI6 parachuted exiles to spark an uprising against Enver Hoxha; most agents were captured or executed.
Covert arms and funding for FNLA/UNITA against the Marxist MPLA; prolonged civil war ended without decisive U.S. victory.
Green light and diplomatic support for the military junta that ousted Isabel Perón; later integrated into Operation Condor.
WW-I defeat forced dissolution of the Habsburg realm and installation of republican governments in Vienna and Budapest.
Western occupation zones helped shape a neutral, democratic 2nd Republic after the State Treaty.
Allied liberation ended Nazi rule and restored the Belgian Government-in-Exile.
CIA-supported General Banzer overthrew left-leaning Juan José Torres.
Rapid OAS audit backed by Washington delegitimised Evo Morales’ re-election, precipitating his ouster; subsequent vote restored MAS.
Operation Brother Sam supplied fuel, communications gear and naval presence that ensured the overthrow of João Goulart.
Covert funding, strike organisation and a CIA front party blocked Cheddi Jagan and installed the pro-Western Forbes Burnham.
CIA-financed plot by Interior-Minister Dap Chhuon against Prince Sihanouk collapsed; Chhuon executed.
Lon Nol (with quiet U.S. approval) used parliament to depose Sihanouk and create the Khmer Republic.
Secret B-52 bombing (Menu / Freedom Deal) tried to cripple Khmer Rouge supply; heavy civilian toll, insurgency strengthened.
Post-Vietnam invasion U.S. backed anti-Vietnamese coalition (incl. Khmer Rouge) diplomatically; coalition never regained Phnom Penh.
Military aid and French-U.S. airlift helped Hissène Habré seize N’Djamena from pro-Libyan forces.
CIA spent $2.6 M on Frei campaign & anti-Allende propaganda to block Socialist victory.
CIA-fuelled Schneider kidnapping plot mis-fired; general killed but Allende still elected.
‘Make the economy scream’: credit cut-offs, covert strikes and propaganda undermined Allende.
Project FUBELT enabled Pinochet to overthrow Allende; long-term military dictatorship followed.
Operation Paper armed KMT remnants in northern Burma to reopen civil war in Yunnan; repelled by PLA, exposed at UN.
Gunboat diplomacy backed Panamanian secession; U.S. obtained Canal Zone treaty.
U.S. backed forces that removed and murdered PM Patrice Lumumba.
Operation Dragon Rouge – U.S./Belgian airborne rescue crushed Simba rebellion in Stanleyville.
CIA aided Mobutu’s second coup; Mobutu ruled for 32 years.
Financial & logistical aid to Figueres rebels after disputed election ousted Calderón government.
Spanish-American War & Platt Amendment occupations shaped Cuban polity.
Bay-of-Pigs invasion and Operation Mongoose failed to overthrow Fidel Castro.
U.S. Marines governed DR, reorganised finances & constabulary.
CIA weapons enabled plotters to kill dictator Rafael Trujillo.
Ford & Kissinger gave Suharto a green light for invasion; lobbying later sustained Indonesian occupation until UN referendum.
Extensive U.S.-Free Officers contact before Nasser’s overthrow of King Farouk.
Shifted guns-and-cash to EPLF & EPRDF insurgents after Mengistu sided with USSR; rebels captured Addis Ababa in 1991.
U.S./UK forces liberated France; supported provisional Gov. de Gaulle.
Defeat of Third Reich followed by denazification and creation of Federal Republic.
Truman Doctrine military aid enabled royalist victory over Communist DSE in civil war.
Operation Urgent Fury removed Marxist Bishop successor regime; elections installed pro-U.S. government.
Early CIA plan to arm Castillo Armas cancelled by Truman.
Psychological warfare and mercenary column toppled Jacobo Árbenz; series of right-wing regimes followed.
U.S. Marines ran customs, rewrote constitution, fought Caco rebels.
Military ouster of elected Pres. Aristide tacitly tolerated by U.S.
Operation Uphold Democracy force-reinstalled Aristide under tight U.S. supervision.
Pressure and Marine deployment removed Aristide a second time.
Series of Marine landings backing U.S. banana interests and compliant presidents.
CIA-supplied Permesta rebels and CAT bomber crews failed to split the archipelago.
Green light, arms and kill-lists enabled Suharto to destroy PKI and depose Sukarno.
Operation Ajax/Boot bribed mobs & officers to oust PM Mosaddegh, strengthening the Shah.
CIA-linked Ba’ath attempt on PM Qasim survived; Saddam fled.
Ba’ath officers overthrew Qasim; U.S. offered rapid recognition & purge intelligence.
Post-Gulf War covert aid to Shia/Kurdish uprisings fizzled.
Operation Iraqi Freedom toppled Saddam; long insurgency, unstable democracy.
Allied campaign toppled Mussolini; co-belligerent monarchy restored democracy.
Massive covert funding and media ops kept the PCI out of government.
Post-war MacArthur constitution & purge; amnesty for Emperor.
Direct U.S. civil administration, base construction, eventual reversion to Japan.
Rapid U.S. diplomatic backing for Tulip Revolution ousted Pres. Akayev.
Air America logistics & Thai artillery restored General Phoumi, tilting the civil-war balance.
NATO no-fly zone evolved into air campaign enabling rebels to kill Muammar Gaddafi.
Arms & volunteers helped Benito Juárez expel French and execute Emperor Maximilian.
Ambassador Henry Lane Wilson connived in ‘Ten Tragic Days’ putsch by Huerta.
Allied forces liberated the country; soon returned to parliamentary rule.
Naval landing forced resignation of Zelaya; Estrada installed.
Extended Marine occupation, created National Guard later ruled by Somoza.
Contra war bled Sandinistas; 1990 election defeat accepted but FSLN later returned.
Operation Just Cause ousted Noriega; U.S. forces stayed through initial elections.
Philippine-American War suppressed First Republic; U.S. colonial rule.
Allied liberation ended Japanese puppet state; U.S. managed transition to independence.
Covert funding to Solidarność, economic sanctions on Jaruzelski; contributed to communist collapse.
Polar Bear & Siberian Expeditions couldn’t prevent Bolshevik victory.
Arms race + embargoes & information ops accelerated USSR dissolution.
Gunboat diplomacy vs. Germany & UK backed competing claimants; stalemate ended with partition in 1899.
USAMGIK suppressed People’s Committees; engineered election of Syngman Rhee.
Cable 243 liaison encouraged generals to oust Diệm; ushered in junta era.
Husni al-Za’im coup approved TAPLINE; CIA connections later acknowledged.
Operations Straggle/Wappen bribed officers but plot exposed, U.S. agents expelled.
‘Syrian Accountability Act’ & covert media ops sought regime change after Hariri assassination.
Timber Sycamore armed rebels; Assad survived with Russian/Iranian aid.
Brief ouster of Hugo Chávez after U.S. funded opposition NGOs; reversed in 48 h.
Recognition of Juan Guaidó and oil sanctions failed to unseat Nicolás Maduro.
OTPOR! training, cash and media aid assisted mass protests that toppled Slobodan Milošević.
